name: Kill Neco-Arc Helicopter
description:
You must defeat Neco Arc or else she will escapes to the real world and go to you exact location to airstrike you.

VOLUME WARNING! this cat be kinda loud, especially when there's 100 of them. 

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Controls:

[W,A,S,D] - move

[Shift] - hold to run

[1] - equip pistol

(RMB) - shoot

[C] - zoom in

[Esc] - pause

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Assets used in this game:

NecoArc model by Paper Bandit

Pistol model by OBUR Games

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
